experience.companyHeader: THE NEW TEACHER PROJECT, NY     /     October 2011 – June 2018     /     Senior Software Developer, DevOps

Extensive use of Linq, LinqToSQL and Entity framework for SQL Server CRUD operations.
Coding standards and practices MVVM (Silverlight), MVC3 (ASP.NET), StyleCop and unit testing.

projects.title: Pavement Management Information Systems

experience.companyHeader: UNIVERSITY OF TOLEDO, OH     /     August 2002 – December 2007     /     DOCTOAL RESEARCH ASSISTANT

projects.title: Doctoral Student
responsibilities: Performed extensive research, development and analysis of pavement management information system (PMIS) for the Ohio Department of Transportation (ODOT).

Utilized data mining algorithms such as cluster analysis, decision trees and fuzzy logic using C# and Java to identify existing patterns in ODOT data.
